name: Handspun Merino: Ruby Shoes
description:
"Ruby Shoes" is spun from red merino wool and has a slight thick-thin quality. Soft and fluffy, this 140 yd (approx) skein should make a delightfully bright and warm scarflette, hat, or other small project.

Merino Wool
approx. 140 yds.

Note: this yarn WILL felt! Please handwash in cool water, air dry.

name: Targhee Handspun: Mother Holle
description:
This earthy yarn is spun from Targhee handpainted fiber. The yarn is springy/squooshy and is a worsted/bulky yarn with an ever-so-slight quality of thick-thin. The 140 yards should be enough for a hat, a neck-decoration or any other small project your imagination can conjure.

Targhee wool
Worsted/Heavy Worsted
140 yards
